snippet: Lance Armstrong sued on Monday to stop the United States Anti-Doping Agency from moving forward with its case against him, but a federal judge struck down the complaint.
abstract: Lance Armstrong sues to stop the United States Anti-Doping Agency from moving forward with its case against him, but a federal Judge Sam Sparks swiftly dismisses the complaint, saying it is filled with irrelevant allegations.
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong sued on Monday to stop the United States Anti-Doping Agency from moving forward with its case against him, but a federal judge struck down the complaint.

headline.seo: Lance Armstrong Suit Is Dismissed by Judge
headline.print_headline: Judge Swiftly Dismisses Suit Filed by Armstrong
